FuncDef: This command specifies a range of encapsulation tag as the host identifications. The encapsulation tag is dot1q or qinq on Ethernet port; VPI/VCI on ATM port.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the value of the start label in the range of SAP s allowed on this host.
Specifies the value of the end label in the range of SAP s allowed on this host.
